 >

Pod::Spec.new do |s|
  s.name             = 'xx'
  s.version          = '0.1.0'
  s.summary          = 'A short description of xx.'

# This description is used to generate tags and improve search results.
#   * Think: What does it do? Why did you write it? What is the focus?
#   * Try to keep it short, snappy and to the point.
#   * Write the description between the DESC delimiters below.
#   * Finally, don't worry about the indent, CocoaPods strips it!

  s.description      = <<-DESC
TODO: Add long description of the pod here.
                       DESC

  s.homepage         = 'https://github.com/chenyp/xx'
  # s.screenshots     = 'www.example.com/screenshots_1', 'www.example.com/screenshots_2'
  s.license          = { :type => 'MIT', :file => 'LICENSE' }
  s.author           = { 'chenyp' => '165685965@qq.com' }
  s.source           = { :git => 'https://github.com/chenyp/xx.git', :tag => s.version.to_s }
  # s.social_media_url = 'https://twitter.com/<TWITTER_USERNAME>'

  s.ios.deployment_target = '10.0'

  s.source_files = 'xx/Classes/**/*'
  
  # s.resource_bundles = {
  #   'xx' => ['xx/Assets/*.png']
  # }

  # s.public_header_files = 'Pod/Classes/**/*.h'
  # s.frameworks = 'UIKit', 'MapKit'
  # s.dependency 'AFNetworking', '~> 2.3'
end

3. é€šè¿‡é«˜åº¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿åˆ›å»º

ä¸€èˆ¬è€Œè¨€ï¼Œåˆ°ä¸Šè¿°å³å¯å®ŒæˆåŸºç¡€çš„æ¨¡æ¿è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œå‡å°‘åˆ›å»ºç§æœ‰åº“åæ‰€éœ€çš„é‡å¤ä¿®æ”¹å­—æ®µçš„å·¥ä½œé‡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äºä¸‹åˆ—é€‰é¡¹çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§ï¼Œå¦‚æœèƒ½çœç•¥å†—ä½™åŠæé«˜ç»Ÿä¸€æ€§ï¼Œè‡ªç„¶æ›´å¥½äº†ï¼š

è¿™å°±éœ€è¦å¯¹pod-templateçš„rubyä»£ç è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹å·²è¾¾åˆ°ä¸éœ€è¦é‡å¤è®¾å®šæ¨¡æ¿äº¤äº’çš„ç›®çš„ï¼š

    def run
      @message_bank.welcome_message

      platform = self.ask_with_answers("What platform do you want to use?", ["iOS", "macOS"]).to_sym

      case platform
        when :macos
          ConfigureMacOSSwift.perform(configurator: self)
        when :ios
          framework = self.ask_with_answers("What language do you want to use?", ["Swift", "ObjC"]).to_sym
          case framework
            when :swift
              ConfigureSwift.perform(configurator: self)

            when :objc
              ConfigureIOS.perform(configurator: self)
          end
      end
      
      #â€¦â€¦æ­¤å¤„çœç•¥åé¢çš„ä»£ç â€¦â€¦#
    end

é€‰æ‹©äº†ç›¸å…³è¯­è¨€ï¼Œå°±åœ¨ç›¸å…³è¯­è¨€çš„ Configure å†…é…ç½®åç»­çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šé€‰æ‹©äº†iOSï¼Œå°±åœ¨ConfigureIOS.rbé…ç½®:

    def perform

      keep_demo = configurator.ask_with_answers("Would you like to include a demo application with your library", ["Yes", "No"]).to_sym

      framework = configurator.ask_with_answers("Which testing frameworks will you use", ["Specta", "Kiwi", "None"]).to_sym
      case framework
        when :specta
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Specta"
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Expecta"

          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Specta;"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Expecta;"

          configurator.set_test_framework("specta", "m", "ios")

        when :kiwi
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Kiwi"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Kiwi;"
          configurator.set_test_framework("kiwi", "m", "ios")

        when :none
          configurator.set_test_framework("xctest", "m", "ios")
      end

      snapshots = configurator.ask_with_answers("Would you like to do view based testing", ["Yes", "No"]).to_sym
      case snapshots
        when :yes
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "FBSnapshotTestCase"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import FBSnapshotTestCase;"

          if keep_demo == :no
              puts " Putting demo application back in, you cannot do view tests without a host application."
              keep_demo = :yes
          end

          if framework == :specta
              configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Expecta+Snapshots"
              configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Expecta_Snapshots;"
          end
      end

      prefix = nil

      loop do
        prefix = configurator.ask("What is your class prefix").upcase

        if prefix.include?(' ')
          puts 'Your class prefix cannot contain spaces.'.red
        else
          break
        end
      end
	      #â€¦â€¦æ­¤å¤„çœç•¥åé¢çš„ä»£ç â€¦â€¦#
  end

    def perform
      #è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿ä¼˜åŒ–: è¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤éœ€è¦demoï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦è®¾ç½®æˆå…¶ä»–çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ¢å¤è¯¢é—®å¼é…ç½®
      keep_demo = "yes"#configurator.ask_with_answers("Would you like to include a demo application with your library", ["Yes", "No"]).to_sym
      #è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š: è¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤ä¸éœ€è¦testing frameworksï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦è®¾ç½®æˆå…¶ä»–çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ¢å¤è¯¢é—®å¼é…ç½®
      framework = "none" #configurator.ask_with_answers("Which testing frameworks will you use", ["Specta", "Kiwi", "None"]).to_sym
      case framework
        when :specta
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Specta"
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Expecta"

          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Specta;"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Expecta;"

          configurator.set_test_framework("specta", "m", "ios")

        when :kiwi
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Kiwi"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Kiwi;"
          configurator.set_test_framework("kiwi", "m", "ios")

        when :none
          configurator.set_test_framework("xctest", "m", "ios")
      end

      #è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šè¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤ä¸éœ€è¦view based testingï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦è®¾ç½®æˆå…¶ä»–çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ¢å¤è¯¢é—®å¼é…ç½®
      snapshots = "no"#configurator.ask_with_answers("Would you like to do view based testing", ["Yes", "No"]).to_sym
      case snapshots
        when :yes
          configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "FBSnapshotTestCase"
          configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import FBSnapshotTestCase;"

          if keep_demo == :no
              puts " Putting demo application back in, you cannot do view tests without a host application."
              keep_demo = :yes
          end

          if framework == :specta
              configurator.add_pod_to_podfile "Expecta+Snapshots"
              configurator.add_line_to_pch "@import Expecta_Snapshots;"
          end
      end

      prefix = nil

      loop do
      #è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šè¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤prefixä¸ºPSCï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦è®¾ç½®æˆå…¶ä»–çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ¢å¤è¯¢é—®å¼é…ç½®
        prefix = "PSC"#configurator.ask("What is your class prefix").upcase

        if prefix.include?(' ')
          puts 'Your class prefix cannot contain spaces.'.red
        else
          break
        end
      end
      #â€¦â€¦æ­¤å¤„çœç•¥åé¢çš„ä»£ç â€¦â€¦#
  end

è‡³æ­¤ï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿å·²ç»å®Œæˆï¼Œå†åˆ›å»ºå¦ä¸€ä¸ªï¼ˆå¦‚æœä½ éœ€è¦ä¿ç•™ä¸Šé¢é‚£ç§ç®€æ˜“è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰gitä»“åº“å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œä¸€é”®åˆ›å»ºæ›´ç¬¦åˆéœ€æ±‚çš„podç§æœ‰åº“æ¨¡æ¿ï¼šletâ€˜s try

      # There has to be a single file in the Classes dir
      # or a framework won't be created, which is now default
      `touch Pod/Classes/ReplaceMe.m`

      `mv ./templates/ios/* ./`

      # remove podspec for osx
      `rm ./NAME-osx.podspec`

use_frameworks!

platform :ios, '10.0'

target '${POD_NAME}_Example' do
  pod '${POD_NAME}', :path => '../'

  target '${POD_NAME}_Tests' do
    inherit! :search_paths

    ${INCLUDED_PODS}
  end
end

use_frameworks!

platform :ios, '12.0'	#å†™è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨çš„podfileé»˜è®¤æ˜¯10.0ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¹æˆä½ éœ€è¦çš„
post_install do |installer|
    installer.generated_projects.each do |project|
          project.targets.each do |target|
              target.build_configurations.each do |config|
                  config.build_settings['IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET'] = '12.0'
                  config.build_settings["DEVELOPMENT_TEAM"] = "xxxxx"	#è¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡å®šç­¾åï¼Œé¿å…ç¼–è¯‘å‡ºé”™è¿˜è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®š
               end
          end
   end
end

use_frameworks!


target '${POD_NAME}_Example' do

#æ–°å»ºpodåº“åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ¿çš„æ—¶å€™æŠŠç§æœ‰åº“æ‹‰å–ä¸€ä¸‹
def debug_pod(pod_name)
  this_pod_name = "${POD_NAME}"
  puts "debug_pod :pod_name = #{pod_name} and this_pod_name is #{this_pod_name}"
  if this_pod_name == pod_name
    puts "#{this_pod_name} is equal args #{pod_name} do not pod"
  elsif
    #ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿ç®¡ç†ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„æ‰€æœ‰ç§æœ‰åº“å»ºè®®æ”¾åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•ä¸‹
    pod "#{pod_name}", :path => "../../#{pod_name}/"
  end
end

  #ä¸ºäº†é¿å…é‡å¤å®šä¹‰ è¿™é‡Œç»Ÿä¸€æŒ‰ä¸‹é¢æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†å§ï¼Œç”±äºä¸‹æ–‡å·²ç»åŒ¹é…äº†å½“å‰podï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸ç”¨æ³¨é‡Šæ‰
  pod '${POD_NAME}', :path => '../'
    
  #è¿™é‡Œå®šä¹‰éœ€è¦è¢«å¼•å…¥çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç§æœ‰åº“çš„åº“å
  private_pods = ["åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶1", "åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶2", "åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶3", "èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶1",  "èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶2",  "èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶3",  "ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶1",  "ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶2"]

  #è¿™é‡Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰ç§æœ‰åº“åä¸è·¯å¾„åŒ¹é…èµ·æ¥è¿›è¡Œpod
  private_pods.each do |private_pod|
    debug_pod(private_pod)
  end


  #å¦‚æœä¸Šè¿°æ–¹æ³•ç”¨ä¸æ¥ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä¸å¥½ç”¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ”¹ç”¨ä¸‹é¢æ¯”è¾ƒä¼ ç»Ÿçš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œï¼š
  #pod 'åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶1', :path => '../../åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶1/'
  #pod 'åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶2', :path => '../../åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶2/'
  #pod 'åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶3', :path => '../../åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶3/'

  #pod 'èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶1', :path => '../../èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶1/'
  #pod 'èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶2', :path => '../../èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶2/'
  #pod 'èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶3', :path => '../../èƒ½åŠ›ç»„ä»¶3/'

  #pod 'ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶1', :path => '../../ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶1/'
  #pod 'ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶2', :path => '../../ä¸šåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶2/'

  target '${POD_NAME}_Tests' do
    inherit! :search_paths
    ${INCLUDED_PODS}
  end
end
